Class PlanCommunicationServlet

java.lang.Object

              com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
                  com.algebraweb.editor.server.logicalplan.communication.PlanCommunicationServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteManipulationService, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService, com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.SerializationPolicyProvider, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class PlanCommunicationServlet
extends com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
implements RemoteManipulationService

Provides all basic plan manipulation methods like adding and deleting nodes, creating edges etc.

Author:
Patrick Brosi
